author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO RESILIENTLY MAINTAINING SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS OVER COOL WATER... ...STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY...
summary: ...IVO RESILIENTLY MAINTAINING SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS OVER COOL WATER... ...STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY... As of 2:00 PM PDT Sun Aug 10 the center of Ivo was located near 22.1, -117.2 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
